data.text:
@tammysteyn gave me feedback on this from XDS. For now, only ID's after 2006 will have a good hit-rate on photos, which kinda sucks for us.... they are busy doing before 2006 but unless the records increase we cannot take this LIVE. The tech behind the search is working fine so we just need to follow up in a couple of months / weeks to see where they are at. @gillianoberholzer @shaunviljoen 

Please archive
